name: Grocery Shop
text: Tailwind css has been used to make this project beautiful. And I did  everything dynamically with React js If you click on each product, dynamically only that product.It will take you to  the description page. In this project, you can increase or decrease the amount of product of your  choice. Be able to deliver.In this project security has been provided. So that your information can be saved

name: Computer Upgrade
text: The name of my project is Computer Upgrade. There are many pages like Home, Home , Dashboard, Blogs, Login and Dashboard user page (Add a review, My order, My Profile) and Admin Page (Manage All Order , Manage Product, Add Product) The first page is called the home page. In which you can see the essence of everything. In Dashboard, you can see payment products as per your need and if you go to card payment, you can add review. There is a page called . In which Hail has been secured

name: Doctor Master
text: In this project you can take the service of your choice. Talk to your doctor in a very short time to find out about the disease.With the project you will find an excellent communication system that will help you.You can tell different types of people about this so that they can get the right treatment etc.Take the services of a doctor and give us feedback which gives us more speed to work
